channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wall Street cheers uptick in layoffs as S&P 500 rises within 1% of its record high
item.description: The Dow gained 331.37, or 0.8%, and the Nasdaq added 43.51, or 0.3%.

item.title: California partners with 5 tech firms to use AI to tackle traffic jams, taxes, other issues
item.description: The companies will start a six-month internal trial where the tools are tested and evaluated by state workers, with each firm being paid $1 for their proposals.

item.title: Bed Bath & Beyond sues Hudson Bay, claiming hedge fund's 'funny math' swiped $300 million from now-bankrupt retailer
item.description: “When all was said and done...BBBY was bankrupt, while the Hudson Bay defendants had reaped a short-swing profit of over $300 million,” the complaint said.

item.title: Gen Zers only plan to have one kid—and that’s bad news for our graying nation
item.description: The number of young women who don't want more children has almost doubled over the last five years.

item.title: Even after cramming its video game with Walmart ads and billboards, Roblox struggles to tap into the wallets of extremely online Gen Alpha
item.description: The gaming platform this week reported its lowest growth rate in gaming time in two years.
